Created an attachment (id=33814)
Stack Trace from Drag and Drop

I am experiencing a Drag and Drop exception using the WST XML Outline (not JSP).  I suggest this bug be modified to be generic for all WST tools.

If I am viewing the content outline for an XML file, and I attempt to reorder two child XML elements in my file by dragging the outline's tree node for the first element to below the second, I get a dialog that says an error has occurred.  If I dismiss the first dialog, another quickly pops up which I cannot dismiss, and my mouse icon remains changed.  At this point, I cannot perform any interaction with Eclipse, my Fedora desktop, or other applications.  I used Ctrl+Alt+F1 to switch to the console, login, and kill -9 off Eclipse.

Attached is the .log file from my workspace from these actions.
